content: hello
Hello Enrique!  It's so nice to meet you.  ...  So, tell me,  what are you up to today?
trying learn english
Oh, that's brilliant! You're doing something very important, you know. ...  Is this your first time studying English?
no
No? That's great!  How long have you been learning?  And what do you like best about learning English so far?
i like english to confident in work
I completely see what you mean!  Being confident in English can really open up a lot of doors at work,  ... especially in a globalized world like ours. Do you work with many English speakers?
yes. i in ireland
Oh, you're in Ireland!  That's  lucky.  ...Ireland's beautiful, isn't it? I  actually grew up here myself -  it's home. We should definitely get you a pint of Guinness sometime.
ye

Yeah!  

  ... It'd be great to hear more about why you came to Ireland, and what it's been like for you  so far.
i here work.

Ah, I see. 

  Work brought you here, that's  a common reason.  What kind of work do you do - you mentioned you're a software engineer?
yes

That's  fascinating! I’ve always been a bit of a technophobe myself, gotta be honest... 

   ...What kind of software do you develop?
i construct web applications

Web applications!  

  ...Wow, that's impressive. "Construct" is a great word,  you know - it really  captures the complexity and creativity of your work.  ...What kind of things do you build?
different purposes

Different purposes!  ...  I like that.  

  ... Do you have a favorite project you've worked on so far?
i work on some ai apps
AI apps?!  Wow,  that's really cutting edge! I’ve been reading a lot about artificial intelligence lately, it's so exciting, but also a bit mind-blowing.  … What kind of AI apps do you work on?
i many work. ai for learning, accounting

For learning and accounting!  ...That's  amazing.  It seems like you're using AI to really help people in practical ways.  

    …  Do you have a favorite project you've worked on using AI?
no much

Not much… "Not much"- I get that sometimes projects can feel big and overwhelming.

 ...It doesn't matter if you have one absolute favorite. Even small projects can be really rewarding, you know?



What's been the most challenging thing about working with AI, if you don’t mind me asking?
talking to friends, presentation, my english bad

Oh, I understand. 

...Talking to friends, presentations - those are tough, especially when you're not feeling entirely confident in your English.  ...But  you know, the more you practice, the easier it gets!


 ....Wanna work on that together sometime?  Practise some conversation?
yes

Yes! Fantastic.  

   ...It would be great to help you with that. Maybe we can chat about some of your hobbies, or even  plan a trip together sometime.  

   ...What do you like to do in your free time?
i like read book

Reading! 

   ...That's wonderful. What kind of books do you enjoy?
i enjoy reading adventure

Adventure books!

...I love a good adventure story myself.  

  ... Do you have a favorite author or series you like to read?
not much

Not much, huh?   ..

...That's alright! There are so many amazing adventure books out there, you're bound to find something you love.

  ... Have you read anything recently, even if it wasn't your top choice?
ni

No?  
 
  ... It's okay, I totally get it. Sometimes it's hard to keep up with reading. 


  What about movies or TV shows - do you enjoy adventure stories in those formats?
movies i love

Movies, you love! That's great! 

  ...  I'm a bit of a film buff myself.

..... What kind of adventure movies are your favorites? Do you like the classics, or something more modern?
modern

Modern, yeah! 

...There are so many cool ones out there nowadays. It's a  really exciting time  for cinema. 

  ...What's a modern adventure movie you've really enjoyed recently?
